info.description: This is the official data model for BARAFIRI API documentation.
info.title: Barafiri Backend API documentation

post.description: Send user data to the main authentication login endpoint endpoint.
post.summary: Endpoint to send user data for login

post.description: When a user decides to change password, frontend call api with old and new password
post.summary: Change password updates a user password with a current one

200.description: Check email for password mail and link

post.description: When a user forgets password, forgetPassword endpoint handles sending a new link for password recovery
post.summary: Endpoint to request for new user password

200.description: Check email for password mail and link

post.description: Send user data to the main authentication endpoint.
post.summary: Endpoint to send user data for registration

post.description: Send user data and verification code to verify validity of verification.
post.summary: Endpoint to verify user registration link

parameters.description: The User Registration data and code
parameters.name: RegistrationData

get.description: Pass token in the Authorization header. Verify the token and send a new one with updated credentials
get.summary: Reset token renews old token string

get.description: Pass token in the Authorization header. Verify token checks if the token is verified and send the authenticated user application related data
get.summary: Checks if an authenticated user token is valid, and send user data of authenticated user

get.description: Pass token in the Authorization header. Verify token checks if the token is verified
get.summary: Checks if an authenticated user token is valid.

patch.description: Update user data. This happens when a user wants to update user information

get.description: Get user uid from url and retrieve user data with the uid string
get.summary: Retrieve user data from user id

post.description: Send user data to the main authentication endpoint.
post.summary: Endpoint to send user data for registration

delete.description: Perform Delete endpoint for Business Registration
delete.summary: Endpoint to delete a user business information

get.description: Get an array of all business and business data
get.summary: Endpoint to get all businesses on BARAFIRI

post.summary: Endpoint to update user business data

get.description: Get orders for a particular business
get.summary: Endpoint to get all business orders

patch.description: Businesses can reject or cancel a user order of their endpoint. Frontend can call this API for that purpose
patch.summary: Endpoint to cancel or reject a user order

post.description: Add products information to store. This makes the product visible to all users
post.summary: Add product to store create new product appended to the store

Endpoint to get business information based on business unique id
